name: Cyclops v1-dv2, 2018
description:
My mythological Cyclops in Bronze, somewhat rubbed, in sensitive places, on a Belgian black marble base. View in AR on mobile to see the scale of this sculpture. 

A first version of Cyclops, which is the second digital version to be minted. This digital version of Cyclops closely matches the physical 3d print edition available from bitforms gallery. And it was in the exhibition "Death Has a Small Voice" at Project Project in Omaha, "The New Flesh" at Local Project art space, Long Island City, and now I am presenting it as part of "👁" at Art Mûr gallery, Montreal.
